name: The Burning Plain
summary_text: A drama with a two-tiered storyline concerning a mother and daughter who try to form a bond after the young woman's difficult childhood.

name: How the West Was Won
summary_text: A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the nineteenth century - including the Gold Rush, the Civil War, and the building of the railroads.

name: Kopps
summary_text: When a small town police station is threatened with shutting down because of too little crime, the police realise that something has to be done...

name: Suspect Zero
summary_text: A mysterious serial killer is hunting other serial killers, and one F.B.I. Agent suspects there may be more to the vigilante than they imagine.

name: Every Day
summary_text: A shy teenager falls for a spirit who wakes up in the body of a different person every morning.

name: Diner
summary_text: A group of college-age buddies struggle with their imminent passage into adulthood in 1959 Baltimore.

name: By the Sea
summary_text: A couple tries to repair their marriage while staying at a hotel in France.

name: The Hard Way
summary_text: An action movie star researching a role is allowed to tag along with a hardboiled New York City policeman, who finds him superficial and irritating.

name: Tulip Fever
summary_text: An artist falls for a young married woman while he's commissioned to paint her portrait during the Tulip mania of seventeenth century Amsterdam.

name: Operation Condor
summary_text: Jackie is hired to help the UN find Nazi gold hidden in Sahara. He's accompanied from Spain by 2 (later 3) cute women. As there are others wanting the gold, lots of kung fu fighting and comedy follows.

name: The Delta Force
summary_text: After a plane is hijacked by terrorists, The Delta Force is sent in to resolve the crisis.

name: The Rewrite
summary_text: An Oscar-winning writer in a slump leaves Hollywood to teach screenwriting at a college on the East Coast, where he falls for a single mom taking classes there.

name: Tape
summary_text: Three old high school friends meet in a Michigan motel room to dissect painful memories from their past.

name: Hello, My Name Is Doris
summary_text: A self-help seminar inspires a sixty-something woman to romantically pursue her younger co-worker.

name: The Flight of the Phoenix
summary_text: After a plane crash in the Sahara, one of the survivors says he's an airplane designer and they can make a flyable plane from the wreckage.

name: Hick
summary_text: A Nebraska teen gets more than she bargained for when she sets out for the bright lights of Las Vegas.

name: Heaven Can Wait
summary_text: A Los Angeles Rams quarterback, accidentally taken away from his body by an overanxious angel before he was meant to die, returns to life in the body of a recently murdered millionaire.

name: Shivers
summary_text: The residents of a suburban high-rise apartment building are being infected by a strain of parasites that turn them into mindless, sex-crazed fiends out to infect others by the slightest sexual contact.

name: The Postman Always Rings Twice
summary_text: A married woman and a drifter fall in love, then plot to murder her husband.

name: The Sweeney
summary_text: A hardened detective in the Flying Squad of London's Metropolitan police. Based on the '70s UK TV show.

name: Barfly
summary_text: Based on the life of successful poet Charles Bukowski and his exploits in Hollywood during the 60s, 70s, and 80s.

name: Croupier
summary_text: An aspiring writer is hired as a croupier at a casino, where he realizes that his life as a croupier would make a great novel.

name: The Beat That My Heart Skipped
summary_text: Will Thomas still lead a life of crime and cruelty, just like his thuggish father, or will he pursue his dream of becoming a pianist?

name: The Glimmer Man
summary_text: Two cops are forced to work together to solve a chain of mysterious killings by a killer nicknamed "The Family Man".

name: Smurfs: The Lost Village
summary_text: In this fully animated, all-new take on the Smurfs, a mysterious map sets Smurfette and her friends Brainy, Clumsy, and Hefty on an exciting race through the Forbidden Forest, leading to the discovery of the biggest secret in Smurf history.

name: Reasonable Doubt
summary_text: A District Attorney has his life turned upside down when he's involved in a hit and run and another man is arrested for his crime and charged with murder.

name: Hum Aapke Hain Koun...!
summary_text: Prem and Nisha meet and fall in love at the wedding of their elder siblings, but their plans to be together are put in jeopardy when Nisha's sister dies, leaving behind a baby.

name: YPF
summary_text: On a Tuesday night, five couples have separate sexual adventures.

name: The Freshman
summary_text: An N.Y.C. film school student accepts a job with a local mobster who resembles a famous cinema godfather and who takes the young man under his wing, after demanding total loyalty.

name: The Object of My Affection
summary_text: A pregnant New York City social worker begins to develop romantic feelings for her gay best friend, and decides she'd rather raise her child with him, much to the dismay of her overbearing boyfriend.

name: A Sound of Thunder
summary_text: A single mistake in the past, by a time travel company in the future, has devastating and unforeseen consequences.

name: Jisatsu sâkuru
summary_text: A detective is trying to find the cause of a string of suicides.

name: Ali Baba ve 7 Cüceler
summary_text: Ali Senay (Cem Yilmaz) and Ilber (Cetin Altay), the two partners of Senay Cüccaciye, sell garden dwarfs. When their company starts to dwindle, they decide to participate in a gardening fair...                See full summary »

name: Nightwatch
summary_text: A law student, who takes a job as a night watchman at a morgue, begins to discover clues that implicate him as the suspect of a series of murders.

name: The Cutting Edge
summary_text: A temperamental figure skater and a former hockey player try to win Olympic gold as a figure skating pairs team.

name: Cargo
summary_text: Dr. Laura P. takes a job on a cargo spaceship for 4 years plus 4 years back. She'll join her sister on Rhea. 44 months later, in Laura's shift, strange things happen in cargo. The crew is reanimated and the captain dies mysteriously.

name: My Dinner with Andre
summary_text: Two old friends meet for dinner; as one tells anecdotes detailing his experiences, the other notices their differing worldviews.

name: Hour of the Wolf
summary_text: While vacationing on a remote Scandanavian island with his younger pregnant wife, an artist has an emotional breakdown while confronting his repressed desires.

name: Nobody's Fool
summary_text: A stubborn man past his prime reflects on his life of strict independence and seeks more from himself.

name: Secret Obsession
summary_text: Recuperating from trauma, Jennifer remains in danger as she returns to a life she doesn't remember.

name: Welcome
summary_text: A man falls in love with a beautiful woman, but later discovers that her brothers are gangsters.

name: Jab Harry Met Sejal
summary_text: A depressed middle-aged tour guide who lives in his own bubble gets another chance to experience and face reality through a chirpy girl.

name: Night of the Comet
summary_text: A comet wipes out most of life on Earth, leaving two Valley Girls fighting against cannibal zombies and a sinister group of scientists.

name: In Hell
summary_text: A man must survive a prison where hardened criminals battle to the death for the wardens' entertainment.

name: Kiss Me Deadly
summary_text: A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious "great whatsit".

name: 99 francs
summary_text: The life of Octave Parango, a flamboyant ad designer, filled with success, satire, misery and love.

name: RamLeela
summary_text: Modern adaptation of William Shakespeare's 'Romeo and Juliet' with an Indian twist, the film focuses on the story of Ram and Leela, their love, lust and the drama afterwards.

name: Darkness
summary_text: A teenage girl moves into a remote countryside house with her family, only to discover that their gloomy new home has a horrifying past that threatens to destroy the family.

name: Meet the Feebles
summary_text: Multiple animals and insects experience the sleazier side of show business while working on a variety show.

name: Ernest & Celestine
summary_text: The story of an unlikely friendship between a bear, Ernest, and a young mouse named Celestine.

name: Foreign Correspondent
summary_text: On the eve of World War II, a young American reporter tries to expose enemy agents in London.

name: My Bloody Valentine
summary_text: A decades-old folk tale surrounding a deranged murderer killing those who celebrate Valentine's Day turns out to be true to legend when a group defies the killer's order and people start turning up dead.

name: In the Realm of the Senses
summary_text: A passionate telling of the story of Sada Abe, a woman whose affair with her master led to an obsessive and ultimately destructive sexual relationship.

name: Traffik
summary_text: A couple off for a romantic weekend in the mountains are accosted by a biker gang. Alone in the mountains, Brea and John must defend themselves against the gang, who will stop at nothing to protect their secrets.

name: Laurence Anyways
summary_text: A drama that charts ten years in a transgender woman's relationship with her lover.

name: Tomboy
summary_text: A family moves into a new neighborhood, and a 10-year-old named Laure deliberately presents as a boy named Mikhael to the neighborhood children.

name: The Butterfly Effect 3: Revelations
summary_text: Sam Reide uses his power to time travel to solve the mystery of his girlfriend's death.

name: Çöpçüler Krali
summary_text: Going through his daily routine in a stereotypical neighborhood, a street cleaner falls in love with a charwoman. Unfortunately for him, so does his boss.

name: Big Miracle
summary_text: In small-town Alaska, a news reporter recruits his ex-girlfriend - a Greenpeace volunteer - on a campaign to save a family of gray whales trapped by rapidly forming ice in the Arctic Circle.

name: Grace of Monaco
summary_text: The story of former Hollywood star Grace Kelly's crisis of marriage and identity, during a political dispute between Monaco's Prince Rainier III and France's Charles De Gaulle, and a looming French invasion of Monaco in the early 1960s.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist
summary_text: Two alchemist brothers go on a quest for the Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their dead mother goes horribly wrong.

name: OSS 117: Cairo, Nest of Spies
summary_text: Secret agent OSS 117 foils Nazis, beds local beauties, and brings peace to the Middle East.

name: Days of Being Wild
summary_text: A man tries to find out who his real mother is after the woman who raised him tells him the truth.

name: Eight Men Out
summary_text: A dramatization of the Black Sox scandal when the underpaid Chicago White Sox accepted bribes to deliberately lose the 1919 World Series.

name: Missing
summary_text: When an idealistic American writer disappears during the Chilean coup d'état in September 1973, his wife and father try to find him.

name: Three... Extremes
summary_text: An Asian cross-cultural trilogy of horror films from accomplished indie directors.

Five carnival workers are kidnapped and held hostage in an abandoned, hellish compound where they are forced to participate in a violent game, the goal of which is to survive twelve hours against a gang of sadistic clowns.

name: The Ledge
summary_text: A police officer looks to talk down a young man lured by his lover's husband to the ledge of a high rise, where he has one hour to contemplate a fateful decision.

name: Harley Davidson and the Marlboro Man
summary_text: Forced by the imminent foreclosure of their friend's bar, two lifelong buddies will decide to rob a bank's armored car, not knowing that its cargo is not money but a new street drug.

name: Peter Pan 2: Return to Never Land
summary_text: In London during World War II, this is the story of Wendy's daughter, Jane, who is kidnapped by Captain Hook and Peter Pan must come to the rescue.

name: Echelon Conspiracy
summary_text: At first, the strange phone messages promised great wealth. Soon, though, government agents pursue the young engineer receiving them around the world.

name: Lake Mungo
summary_text: Strange things start happening after a girl is found drowned in a lake.

name: La Notte
summary_text: A day in the life of an unfaithful married couple and their steadily deteriorating relationship.

name: Crooked House
summary_text: In Agatha Christie's most twisted tale, a spy-turned-private-detective is lured by his former lover to catch her grandfather's murderer before Scotland Yard exposes dark family secrets.

name: Brassed Off
summary_text: The coal mine in a northern English village may be closing, which would also mean the end of the miners' brass band.

name: The Final Conflict
summary_text: The now adult Antichrist plots to eliminate his future divine opponent while a cabal of monks plot to stop him.

name: The Big Red One
summary_text: A hardened sergeant and the four core members of his infantry unit try to survive World War II as they move from battle to battle throughout Europe.

name: Starry Eyes
summary_text: A hopeful young starlet uncovers the ominous origins of the Hollywood elite and enters into a deadly agreement in exchange for fame and fortune.

name: Süt Kardesler
summary_text: Saban, Ramazan and Bayram are sailors in an Ottoman Navy and Hüsamettin is their commander. Hüsamettin's aide Ramazan, Saban who is foster son of Hüsamettin's sister and Bayram who is ...                See full summary »

name: Suburra
summary_text: A gangster known as "Samurai" wants to turn the waterfront of Rome into a new Las Vegas. All the local mob bosses have agreed to work for this common goal. But peace is not to last long.

name: Dick
summary_text: Two girls wander away from a White House tour and meet President Nixon.

name: The Other Woman
summary_text: The story of a woman dealing with her infant daughter's death while trying to keep her marriage and her relationship with her stepson.

name: David Brent: Life on the Road
summary_text: A camera crew catches up with David Brent, the former star of the fictional British TV series The Office (2001), as he now fancies himself a rock star on the road.

name: Safety Last!
summary_text: A boy leaves his small country town and heads to the big city to get a job. As soon as he makes it big his sweetheart will join him and marry him. His enthusiasm to get ahead leads to some interesting adventures.

name: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
summary_text: A bookworm becomes the librarian. Same night a magical spear gets stolen and he's off to get some real life experience around the globe on his quest for the spear - starting with being thrown off a plane over Amazonas by his cute helper.

name: Wish Upon
summary_text: A teenage girl discovers a box that carries magic powers and a deadly price for using them.

name: Playing by Heart
summary_text: Eleven articulate people work through affairs of the heart in Los Angeles.

name: Akeelah and the Bee
summary_text: A young girl from South Los Angeles tries to make it to the National Spelling Bee.

name: Point Blank
summary_text: After being double-crossed and left for dead, a mysterious man named Walker single-mindedly tries to retrieve the money that was stolen from him.

name: Shaolin
summary_text: After ambushing and killing his rival, losing everything in the process, dispirited warlord Hou Jie turns to a Shaolin monastery seeking salvation.

name: Malibu's Most Wanted
summary_text: A senator arranges for his son, a rich white kid who fancies himself black, to be kidnapped by a couple of black actors pretending to be murderers to try and shock him out of his plans to become a rapper.

name: No Escape
summary_text: A soldier convicted for murdering his commanding officer is dumped and left to die on a prison island inhabited by two camps of convicts.

name: Deadgirl
summary_text: Two high school boys discover an imprisoned woman in an abandoned mental asylum who cannot die.

name: Krrish
summary_text: Krishna is forced by circumstances to use his superpowers and become the masked superhero Krrish, before getting drawn towards his lost legacy.

name: Los Olvidados
summary_text: A group of juvenile delinquents live a violent and crime-filled life in the festering slums of Mexico City, and the morals of young Pedro are gradually corrupted and destroyed by the others.

name: Dragon Blade
summary_text: When corrupt Roman leader Tiberius arrives with a giant army to claim the Silk Road, Huo An teams up his army with an elite Legion of defected Roman soldiers led by General Lucius to protect his country and his new friends.

name: Quarantine 2: Terminal
summary_text: A plane is taken over by a mysterious virus. When the plane lands it is placed under quarantine. Now a group of survivors must band together to survive the quarantine.

name: License to Drive
summary_text: A teen decides to go for a night on the town with his friends despite flunking his driver's test.

name: Someone Great
summary_text: After a devastating break up on the eve of her cross-country move, Jenny enjoys one last NYC adventure with her two best pals. Someone Great is a romantic comedy about love, loss, growth and the everlasting bond of female friendship.

name: Sorcerer
summary_text: Four unfortunate men from different parts of the globe agree to risk their lives transporting gallons of nitroglycerin across dangerous Latin American jungle.

name: Lantana
summary_text: The relationships of four couples unravel after the discovery of a young woman's body in Lantana bush in suburban Sydney.

name: Brain on Fire
summary_text: A young, capable professional cannot explain her newly erratic behavior.

name: A Midsummer Night's Sex Comedy
summary_text: A wacky inventor and his wife invite two other couples for a weekend party at a romantic summer house in the 1900s countryside.

name: The Bird with the Crystal Plumage
summary_text: An American expatriate in Rome witnesses an attempted murder that is connected to an ongoing killing spree in the city, and conducts his own investigation despite himself and his girlfriend being targeted by the killer.

name: Tallulah
summary_text: Desperate to be rid of her toddler, a dissatisfied Manhattan housewife hires a stranger to babysit and ends up getting much more than she bargained for.

name: Tracers
summary_text: Wanted by the Chinese mafia, a New York City bike messenger escapes into the world of parkour after meeting a beautiful stranger.

name: Freier Fall
summary_text: A soon-to-be-father policeman falls for a gay fellow officer and his life starts falling apart.

name: Aquarius
summary_text: Clara, 65, lives her life to the fullest with her family and friends. A construction company wants her Recife oceanfront condo, as they've already bought all the other in the 3 story building. Clara's staying.

name: Silkwood
summary_text: A worker at a plutonium processing plant is purposefully contaminated, psychologically tortured and possibly murdered to prevent her from exposing worker safety violations at the plant.

name: Father Figures
summary_text: Upon learning that their mother has been lying to them for years about their allegedly deceased father, two fraternal twin brothers hit the road in order to find him.

name: Rim of the World
summary_text: Four misfit campers must band together and conquer their fears in order to save the world during an alien invasion.

name: Streets of Fire
summary_text: A mercenary is hired to rescue his ex-girlfriend, a singer who has been kidnapped by a motorcycle gang.

name: Interiors
summary_text: Three sisters find their lives spinning out of control in the wake of their parents' sudden, unexpected divorce.

name: Phir Hera Pheri
summary_text: Baburao, Raju and Shyam are living happily after having risen from rags to riches. Still, money brings the joy of riches and with it the greed to make more money. And so, with a don as an unknowing investor, Raju initiates a new game.

name: New York, New York
summary_text: An egotistical saxophonist and a young lounge singer meet on VJ Day and embark upon a strained and rocky romance, even as their careers begin a long, uphill climb.

name: 2 Days in the Valley
summary_text: 48 hours of intersecting lives and crimes in Los Angeles.

name: Faces in the Crowd
summary_text: A horror-thriller centered on a woman living with "face-blindness" after surviving a serial killer's attack. As she lives with her condition, one in which facial features change each time she loses sight of them, the killer closes in.

name: Tall Girl
summary_text: Jodi, the tallest girl in her high school, has always felt uncomfortable in her own skin. But after years of slouching, being made fun of, and avoiding attention at all costs, Jodi finally decides to find the confidence to stand tall.

name: Night Train to Lisbon
summary_text: Swiss Professor Raimund Gregorius (Jeremy Irons) abandons his lectures and buttoned-down life to embark on a thrilling adventure that will take him on a journey to the very heart of himself.

name: Limelight
summary_text: A fading comedian and a suicidally despondent ballet dancer must look to each other to find purpose and hope in their lives.

name: One Cut of the Dead
summary_text: Things go badly for a hack director and film crew shooting a low budget zombie movie in an abandoned WWII Japanese facility, when they are attacked by real zombies.

name: Hababam Sinifi Uyaniyor
summary_text: A kind and hardworking student joins to Hababam Sinifi (The Chaos Class) but they don't accept him as one of them and he becomes the target of all class' pranks.

name: My Girl 2
summary_text: Vada Sultenfuss must go to LA to stay with her Uncle Phil to do some research on her mother's life, but finds much more.

name: Loving Pablo
summary_text: A journalist strikes up a romantic relationship with notorious drug lord Pablo Escobar.

name: Babette's Feast
summary_text: During the late 19th century, a strict religious community in a Danish village takes in a French refugee from the Franco-Prussian War as a servant to the late pastor's daughters.

name: My Life as a Dog
summary_text: A boy and his brother don't get along well. In order to let their ill mother rest, they're separated and sent each one with their relatives.

name: Magadheera
summary_text: A warrior gets reincarnated 400 years later, after trying to save the princess and the kingdom, who also dies along with him. He then sets back again to fight against all odds and win back his love.

name: Kabhi Alvida Naa Kehna
summary_text: Dev, a former football player is married to Rhea, a successful fashion editor. Maya is a kindergarten teacher who is married to Rishi, an outgoing event planner. These couples' lives intersect and they each question their own marriage.

name: Max Steel
summary_text: The adventures of teenager Max McGrath and his alien companion, Steel, who must harness and combine their tremendous new powers to evolve into the turbo-charged superhero Max Steel.

name: Let It Snow
summary_text: In a small town on Christmas Eve, a snowstorm brings together a group of young people.

name: Pacific Heights
summary_text: A couple work hard to renovate their dream house and become landlords to pay for it. Unfortunately, one of their tenants has plans of his own.

name: Less Than Zero
summary_text: A college freshman returns to L.A. for the holidays at his ex-girlfriend's request, but discovers that his former best friend has an out-of-control drug habit.

name: My Life in Ruins
summary_text: A disgruntled tour guide in Greece gains an unexpected new outlook on life thanks to one of the people on what she intends to be her last tour.

name: Carandiru
summary_text: Brazilian MD Drauzio Varella starts AIDS prevention in Brazil's largest prison, Carandiru, in São Paulo, where the population is nearly double its 4,000 maximum. Doc learns from experience ...                See full summary »

name: Kinky Boots
summary_text: A drag queen comes to the rescue of a man who, after inheriting his father's shoe factory, needs to diversify his product if he wants to keep the business afloat.

name: Dhoom
summary_text: A mysterious gang of bikers is on a robbing spree. ACP Jai gets Ali, a mechanic, to assist him in the case. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to nab the thieves red-handed.

name: Return to the Blue Lagoon
summary_text: In this sequel to The Blue Lagoon (1980), two children are stranded on a beautiful island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together and eventually become suntanned teenagers in love.

name: À la folie... pas du tout
summary_text: A young woman who is in love with a married doctor becomes dangerous when her attempts to persuade him to leave his wife are unsuccessful. However, when things are seen from his point of view, the real situation becomes clear.

name: Resident Evil: Damnation
summary_text: Special Agent Leon S.Kennedy goes against his superior's orders and works to destroy a series of biological weapons being used in a war zone in Europe.

name: Bad Ass
summary_text: A Vietnam veteran who becomes a local hero after saving a man from attackers on a city bus decides to take action when his best friend is murdered and the police show little interest in solving the crime.

name: Au Hasard Balthazar
summary_text: The story of a mistreated donkey and the people around him. A study on saintliness and a sister piece to Bresson's Mouchette.

name: Lean on Me
summary_text: The dedicated but tyrannical Joe Clark is appointed the principal of a decaying inner-city school he is determined to improve by any and all means.

name: The Clovehitch Killer
summary_text: A picture-perfect family is shattered when the work of a serial killer hits too close to home.

name: 3:10 to Yuma
summary_text: Broke small-time rancher Dan Evans is hired by the stagecoach line to put big-time captured outlaw leader Ben Wade on the 3:10 train to Yuma but Wade's gang tries to free him.

name: Return of the Living Dead II
summary_text: Curious kids unearth the barrels that previously helped revive the dead, which proves the second time's an undead charm.

name: Cockneys vs Zombies
summary_text: A gang of bank robbers fight their way out of a zombie-infested London.

name: Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia
summary_text: An American bar room pianist and his prostitute girlfriend go on a trip through the Mexican underworld to collect a bounty on the head of a dead gigolo.

name: Toilet: A Love Story
summary_text: A woman threatens to leave her husband unless he installs a toilet in their home. To win back her love and respect, he heads out on a journey to fight against the backward society.

name: Children of Paradise
summary_text: The theatrical life of a beautiful courtesan and the four men who love her.

name: Paper Man
summary_text: A washed-up writer forms an unlikely friendship with a teenager from Long Island.

name: Bharat
summary_text: At the cusp of India's birth as an Independent nation, a family makes an arduous journey to freedom at a cost. A young boy Bharat, makes a promise to his Father that he will keep his family together no matter what.

name: Turtles Can Fly
summary_text: Near the Iraqi-Turkish border on the eve of an American invasion, refugee children like 13-year-old Kak (Ebrahim), gauge and await their fate.

name: Son of God
summary_text: The life story of Jesus is told from his humble birth through his teachings, crucifixion and ultimate resurrection.

name: Three to Tango
summary_text: A rich businessman's assumption that his new colleague is gay leads him to ask the man to keep an eye on his mistress. However, the man is not gay, and begins to fall for the woman himself.

name: Exotica
summary_text: A man plagued by neuroses frequents the club Exotica in an attempt to find solace, but even there his past is never far away.

name: Ben X
summary_text: As an alternative to getting bullied at school, an autistic teenager retreats into the world of online role-playing games.

name: Jumpin' Jack Flash
summary_text: A computer wiz woman/W.Goldberg works at a computer terminal in a NYC bank. One day she gets a strange message and breaks the code. Suddenly, she finds herself in the middle of dangerous spy business.

name: Drive Me Crazy
summary_text: Nicole and Chase used to be BFFs, then junior high happened. The high school centennial dance is coming but Nicole gets dumped. So does Chase. They stage a relationship to get at their exes. They visit each other's worlds. Love in the air?

name: Just Visiting
summary_text: A French count is in England to marry the princess. She's killed. A wizard helps him time travel back before the murder - but ends up in Chicago, April 2000. A descendant helps him. Can he return to the 1100s?

name: Earth to Echo
summary_text: After receiving a bizarre series of encrypted messages, a group of kids embark on an adventure with an alien who needs their help.

name: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween
summary_text: Two young friends find a magic book that brings a ventriloquist's dummy to life.

name: Higher Learning
summary_text: People from all different walks of life, encounter racial tension, rape, responsibility, and the meaning of an education on a university campus.

name: Betty Blue
summary_text: A lackadaisical handyman and aspiring novelist tries to support his younger girlfriend as she slowly succumbs to madness.

name: Wolf Creek 2
summary_text: The outback once more becomes a place of horror as another unwitting tourist becomes the prey for crazed, serial-killing pig-hunter Mick Taylor.

name: Welcome to Me
summary_text: When Alice Klieg wins the Mega-Millions lottery, she immediately quits her psychiatric meds and buys her own talk show.

name: Their Finest
summary_text: A former secretary, newly appointed as a scriptwriter for propaganda films, joins the cast and crew of a major production while the Blitz rages around them.

name: Havoc
summary_text: Two affluent suburban girls clash with the Latino gang culture of East Los Angeles.

name: Shrink
summary_text: Unable to cope with a recent personal tragedy, LA's top celebrity shrink turns into a pothead with no concern for his appearance and a creeping sense of his inability to help his patients.

name: Dum Laga Ke Haisha
summary_text: Prem and his oversized wife Sandhya are supposed to spend a lifetime together. Will a regular arranged marriage turn out to be a perfect mismatch?

name: The Shaggy Dog
summary_text: A man tries to live a normal life despite the fact that he sometimes turns into a sheepdog.

name: Bad Genius
summary_text: Lynn, a genius high school student who makes money by cheating tests, receives a new task that leads her to set foot on Sydney, Australia. In order to complete the millions-Baht task, Lynn and her classmates have to finish the international STIC(SAT) exam and deliver the answers back to her friends in Thailand before the exam takes place once again in her home country.

name: Sonatine
summary_text: Several yakuza from Tokyo are sent to Okinawa to help end a gang war. The war then escalates and the Tokyo drifters decide to lay low at the beach.

name: Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood
summary_text: After years of mother-daughter tension, Siddalee receives a scrapbook detailing the wild adventures of the "Ya-Yas", her mother's girlhood friends.

name: The ABCs of Death
summary_text: A 26-chapter anthology that showcases death in all its vicious wonder and brutal beauty.

name: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold
summary_text: One year after their first adventure, Mitch Robbins and his friends discover a treasure map that belonged to their late trail guide Curly and they set out to discover its secrets.

name: Head of State
summary_text: When a presidential candidate dies unexpectedly in the middle of the campaign, Washington, D.C. alderman, Mays Gilliam is unexpectedly picked as his replacement.

name: The Silence
summary_text: Two estranged sisters, Ester and Anna, and Anna's 10-year-old son travel to the Central European country on the verge of war. Ester becomes seriously ill and the three of them move into a hotel in a small town called Timoka.

name: The Rugrats Movie
summary_text: The babies gets lost in the forest after Tommy Pickles (Elizabeth Daily) gets a new baby brother.

name: Venus in Fur
summary_text: An actress attempts to convince a director how she's perfect for a role in his upcoming production.

name: He Never Died
summary_text: Jack, a social outcast, is thrust out of his comfort zone when the outside world bangs on his door and he can't contain his violent past.

name: The Aftermath
summary_text: Post World War II, a British colonel and his wife are assigned to live in Hamburg during the post-war reconstruction, but tensions arise with the German who previously owned the house.

name: Genius
summary_text: A chronicle of Max Perkins's time as the book editor at Scribner, where he oversaw works by Thomas Wolfe, Ernest Hemingway, F. Scott Fitzgerald and others.

name: Life Itself
summary_text: As a young New York City couple goes from college romance to marriage and the birth of their first child, the unexpected twists of their journey create reverberations that echo over continents and through lifetimes.

name: Citizen X
summary_text: During the 1980s, Soviet authorities hunt for a serial killer who picks his victims in railway stations and commuter trains and lures them into the woods.

name: Pat Garrett & Billy the Kid
summary_text: Pat Garrett is hired as a lawman on behalf of a group of wealthy New Mexico cattle barons to bring down his old friend Billy the Kid.

name: Muppets from Space
summary_text: Gonzo is contacted by his alien family through his breakfast cereal. But when the men in black kidnap him, it's up to Kermit and the gang to rescue Gonzo and help him reunite with his long-lost family.

name: Rampage
summary_text: A man with a thirst for revenge builds a full body armor from Kevlar and goes on a killing spree.

name: Cleo from 5 to 7
summary_text: Cleo, a singer and hypochondriac, becomes increasingly worried that she might have cancer while awaiting test results from her doctor.

name: Big Night
summary_text: New Jersey, 1950s. Two brothers run an Italian restaurant. Business is not going well as a rival Italian restaurant is out-competing them. In a final effort to save the restaurant, the brothers plan to put on an evening of incredible food.

name: The Public Enemy
summary_text: An Irish-American street punk tries to make it big in the world of organized crime.

name: The Promotion
summary_text: Two assistant managers of a corporate grocery store vie for a coveted promotion.

name: Lovers of the Arctic Circle
summary_text: In cold Lapland Finland, under the eternal midnight sun, two ardent lovers reunite once again after a long period apart, governed by a powerful and eloquent circular motif woven by destiny, faith, and love. Can they deny their destiny?

name: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon: Sword of Destiny
summary_text: A story of lost love, young love, a legendary sword and one last opportunity at redemption.

name: Sharknado 2: The Second One
summary_text: Fin and April are on their way to New York City, until a category seven hurricane spawns heavy rain, storm surges, and deadly Sharknadoes.

name: Hanky Panky
summary_text: A man's simple lie to secure his job escalates into more complex lies when his orthodox boss gets suspicious.

name: Where'd You Go, Bernadette
summary_text: A loving mom becomes compelled to reconnect with her creative passions after years of sacrificing herself for her family. Her leap of faith takes her on an epic adventure that jump-starts her life and leads to her triumphant rediscovery.

name: Evangelion: 1.0 You Are (Not) Alone
summary_text: The fate of the world is threatened by seemingly monstrous entities known as Angels. NERV is an organisation set up to counter this threat and it is up to young pilots to protect Earth but exactly what are the real motives behind NERV?

name: Lady and the Tramp
summary_text: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

name: Sivaji
summary_text: A software engineer comes to India to serve the nation and invest in nation's welfare. A few corrupt officials and politicians try to stop him while he tries to do good for the poor.

name: Superstar
summary_text: A nerdy Catholic schoolgirl, Mary Katherine Gallagher, dreams of superstardom.

name: The Day of the Beast
summary_text: Bent on committing as many sins as possible to avert the birth of the beast, a Catholic priest teams up with a Black Metal aficionado and an Italian connoisseur of the occult. Now, he must become an unrelenting sinner. Is there still hope?

name: Internal Affairs
summary_text: An Internal Affairs agent becomes obsessed with bringing down a cop who has managed to maintain a spotless reputation despite being involved in a web of corruption.

name: Midway
summary_text: A dramatization of the battle that was widely heralded as a turning point of the Pacific Theatre of World War II.

name: Devil in a Blue Dress
summary_text: An African-American man is hired to find a woman, and gets mixed up in a murderous political scandal.

name: Tom Clancy's Without Remorse
summary_text: John Clark, a Navy SEAL, goes on a path to avenge his wife's murder only to find himself inside of a larger conspiracy.

name: Love Wedding Repeat
summary_text: While trying to make his sister's wedding day go smoothly, Jack finds himself juggling an angry ex-girlfriend, an uninvited guest with a secret, a misplaced sleep sedative, and the girl that got away in alternate versions of the same day.

name: Jolly LLB
summary_text: Wanting to earn fame and fortune, a small time lawyer files a PIL for an infamous hit-and-run, and thus learns what it really is like to be a lawyer.

name: Kidulthood
summary_text: A day in the life of a group of troubled 15-year-olds growing up in west London.

name: The Chumscrubber
summary_text: A darkly satiric story about life crumbling in the midst of a seemingly idyllic suburbia.

name: The Awful Truth
summary_text: A married couple file an amicable divorce, but find it harder to let go of each other than they initially thought.

name: Lung hing foo dai
summary_text: Asian Hawk (Jackie Chan) and his bumbling sidekick are sent on a quest through Europe to find a mysterious treasure held by a shadowy organization of monks.

name: Wheelman
summary_text: A getaway driver for a bank robbery realizes he has been double crossed and races to find out who betrayed him.

name: Silver Streak
summary_text: On a long-distance train trip, a man finds romance but also finds himself in danger of being killed, or at least pushed off the train.

name: Splendor in the Grass
summary_text: A fragile Kansas girl's love for a handsome young man from the town's most powerful family drives her to heartbreak and madness.

name: The Trust
summary_text: A pair of cops investigating a drug invasion stumble upon a mysterious bank vault.

name: Never Rarely Sometimes Always
summary_text: A pair of teenage girls in rural Pennsylvania travel to New York City to seek out medical help after an unintended pregnancy.

name: Get Over It
summary_text: A high school senior's girlfriend breaks up with him. His friends try to make him think of something else. His friend's sister Kelly helps him with the school musical. Spending time with Kelly has an effect.

name: The Ultimate Gift
summary_text: A deceased billionaire leaves his spoiled adult grandson a series of odd tasks to perform in order to receive "the ultimate gift," with the resentful grandson having no idea what that might be.

name: My Cousin Rachel
summary_text: A young Englishman plots revenge against his late cousin's mysterious, beautiful wife, believing her responsible for his death. But his feelings become complicated as he finds himself falling under the beguiling spell of her charms.

name: Cuban Fury
summary_text: Beneath Bruce Garrett's under-confident, overweight exterior, the passionate heart of a salsa king lies dormant. Now, one woman is about to reignite his Latin fire.

name: Gerry
summary_text: A friendship between two young men is tested when they go for a hike in a desert and forget to bring any water or food with them.

name: Fahrenheit 451
summary_text: In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young woman - and begins to rebel against society.

name: Miracle at St. Anna
summary_text: Set in 1944 Italy, the story of four black American soldiers who get trapped in a Tuscan village during WWII.

name: Nighthawks
summary_text: When one of Europe's most lethal terrorists shows up in New York, an elite undercover cop is assigned to take him down by any means necessary.

name: Batman Ninja
summary_text: Batman, along with a number of his allies and adversaries, finds himself transplanted from modern Gotham City to feudal Japan.

name: Lost Girls
summary_text: When Mari Gilbert's daughter disappears, police inaction drives her own investigation into the gated Long Island community where Shannan was last seen. Her search brings attention to over a dozen murdered sex workers.

name: The Last Station
summary_text: A historical drama that illustrates Russian author Leo Tolstoy's (Christopher Plummer's) struggle to balance fame and wealth with his commitment to a life devoid of material things.

name: Bratz
summary_text: During their first year of high school, four best girlfriends face off against the domineering student body President, who wants to split them up into different social cliques.

name: A Short Film About Killing
summary_text: A soon-to-be lawyer crosses his path with a taxi driver and a young sinister man.

name: Trolls World Tour
summary_text: When the Queen of the Hard Rock Trolls tries to take over all the Troll kingdoms, Queen Poppy and her friends try different ways to save all the Trolls.

name: L'Eclisse
summary_text: A young woman meets a vital young man, but their love affair is doomed because of the man's materialistic nature.

name: The Last Man on Earth
summary_text: When a disease turns all of humanity into the living dead, the last man on earth becomes a reluctant vampire hunter.

name: Special Forces
summary_text: A French journalist in Afghanistan is kidnapped by the Taliban.

name: Manjhi: The Mountain Man
summary_text: Using only a hammer and a chisel, a man spends twenty-two years carving a road through a treacherous mountain.

name: Bel Ami
summary_text: A chronicle of a young man's rise to power in Paris via his manipulation of the city's wealthiest and most influential women.

name: Mayhem
summary_text: A virus spreads through an office complex causing white collar workers to act out their worst impulses.

name: The Child
summary_text: Bruno and Sonia, a young couple living off her benefit and the thefts committed by his gang, have a new source of money: their newborn son.

name: Recep Ivedik 3
summary_text: Recep Ivedik has been depressed since the death of his grandmother. Everyone who tries to help him fails. A young girl named Zeynep, who can't find an apartment, stays with Recep. Initially...                See full summary »

name: Just Before I Go
summary_text: On the verge of giving up on life, a guy travels to his hometown to make amends.

name: You Kill Me
summary_text: While drying out on the West Coast, an alcoholic hitman befriends a tart-tongued woman who might just come in handy when it's time for him to return to Buffalo and settle some old scores.

name: Cheap Thrills
summary_text: A scheming couple put a struggling family man and his old friend through a series of increasingly twisted dares over the course of an evening at a local bar.

name: Thugs of Hindostan
summary_text: Recruited by the East India Company, a local thug infiltrates a troop of patriotic bandits who plan to overthrow the British regime and reclaim their independence.

name: Dark Passage
summary_text: A man convicted of murdering his wife escapes from prison and works with a woman to try and prove his innocence.

name: Down in the Valley
summary_text: Set in the present-day San Fernando Valley, the project revolves around a delusional man who believes he's a cowboy and the relationship that he starts with a rebellious young woman.

name: Flawless
summary_text: An ultraconservative security guard suffers a debilitating stroke and is assigned to a rehabilitative program that includes singing lessons, with the drag queen next door.

name: Seungriho
summary_text: Set in the year 2092 and follows the crew of a space junk collector ship called The Victory. When they discover a humanoid robot named Dorothy that's known to be a weapon of mass destruction, they get involved in a risky business deal.

name: Songs from the Second Floor
summary_text: Where are we humans going? A film poem inspired by the Peruvian poet César Vallejo. We meet people in the city. People trying to communicate, searching compassion and get the connection of small and large things.

name: F/X
summary_text: A movie special effects man is hired to fake a real-life mob killing for a witness protection plan, but finds his own life in danger.

name: King of Devil's Island
summary_text: Norwegian winter, early 20th century. On the boys home Bastoy, a new inmate leads the boys to a violent uprising against a brutal regime. How far is he willing to go to attain freedom?

name: Wheels
summary_text: Two suicidal paraplegic junkies hustle their way through the city streets trying to find a reason to live.
